An example of creating package 'decisionTree':

```{r}
library(devtools)
library(roxygen2)

setwd('~/.R/my_libs')
create('decisionTree')
setwd('./decisionTree')

document()  # creates manual/documentation

setwd('..')
install('decisionTree')  # install package

```
